TopicTitle: IDEA: Premium version with a kontroller!

Articles.Content:
Think in the same vein as the premium version of Fallout with the PitBoy kit. 

Custom controllers and KSP go hand in hand, having that conceptualized through the game creator's lens would be worth a $150 price tag for Game w/ DLC season pass and a licensed kontroller kit, imo!!
seems like a great deal, most people would just get it for the controller.
